definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
to wake up/to be awake/to become aware/to sober up/to come to

sentences.english: How do you stay levelheaded in the middle of a bubble?
sentences.chinese: 在泡沫时期你怎么保持清醒的头脑？

sentences.english: And drinking largely sobers us again.
sentences.chinese: 豪饮则便使人再度清醒。

sentences.english: The question is:Is the sleepwalker actually awake or asleep?
sentences.chinese: 问题是，梦游者实际上是清醒的还是仍在睡觉呢？

sentences.english: It could make you more alert and help you avoid an afternoon energy slump.
sentences.chinese: 它能让你更加清醒，还能帮你避免下午犯困。

sentences.english: He Lin recognized the necessity of modernization of philosophical methodology.
sentences.chinese: 贺麟清醒的认识到哲学方法论现代化的必要性。

sentences.english: No man in his senses would have done so.
sentences.chinese: 没有一个神志清醒的人会这样做。

sentences.english: If tired, smell a whiff of clove oil and it will wake you up.
sentences.chinese: 如果疲倦，闻上一点丁香油将令人清醒。

sentences.english: In addition, Customer must be clear-headed when someone wants to cheat you.
sentences.chinese: 此外，当有人要骗你的时候客户必须有着清醒的头脑。

sentences.english: It’s safe to say that lucid dreams are unlike anything else you’ve ever experienced.
sentences.chinese: 可以肯定地说，清醒梦会给你带来全新的体验。

sentences.english: He apologized when he sobered up.
sentences.chinese: 他清醒过来后表示道歉。
梅德琳是个头脑清醒的姑娘。

sentences.english: I establish my lucidity in the midst of what negates it.
sentences.chinese: 我将我的清醒置于了对它的否定之中。

sentences.english: When lucid dreaming I still have access to all my waking memories.
sentences.chinese: 在清醒梦中我还可以触碰到所有清醒时的记忆。

sentences.english: When lucid dreaming I still have access to all my waking memories.
sentences.chinese: 在清醒梦中我还可以触碰到所有清醒时的记忆。

sentences.english: He was conscious, slightly hypothermic and appeared to have some frostbite.
sentences.chinese: 他很清醒，略有体温过低的状况，好像还有些冻伤。

sentences.english: According to Krauss, "Insanity is a dream in which the senses are awake."
sentences.chinese: 克劳斯认为，“精神错乱则是感官清醒时的梦。”

definition: to come to/to awaken/to regain consciousness
to come to oneself/to come to realize/to come to see the truth/to wake up to reality
to wake up/to be awake/to become aware/to sober up/to come to
